values_hero_title: A Global Community for Human-Centric Data Sovereignty, Sovereign AI, and Cyber Technology for Human Good
values_hero_subtitle: A global community pioneering human-centric data sovereignty, sovereign AI, and cyber technology for the betterment of humanity
blog_page_subtitle: Explore our diverse collection of blogs covering AI ethics, technology, faith, and the intersection of digital innovation with human values.
blog_error: Failed to load blogs. Please try again later.
blog_empty_message: We're working on adding new content. Check back soon!

values_why_paragraph1: In the age of artificial intelligence, the very definition of what it means to be human is being rewritten. We are called to help chart a course for humanity where technology is advanced in authentic service of the human family.
values_why_quote: Technology can and must lift up humanity, and humanity must not become subjugated to technology
values_why_paragraph2: Like every advancement of the human spirit, AI can be an incredible gift to improve the lives of billions and find solutions to urgent global challenges. Conversely, it can also accelerate inequality and discrimination, eroding the human and ethical dimension from our societies.
values_why_paragraph3: DCF created an international platform that serves as a tool at the service of the Catholic Church in advancing its mission on ethical technology. We are building a constellation of organizations and individuals with globally recognized expertise to create a "cyber commons" as a bridge for ethical, responsible and human-centered technology inspired by Catholic Social teachings and principles shared across all faiths.
values_principle1_desc: Established with inspiration from the Catholic Church and Vatican engagement, ensuring unbiased dedication to human-centered ethical technology development.
values_principle2_desc: A network of nonprofits across the Global North, South, East and West, bringing together strengths from around the world to avoid geographical tech dominance.
values_principle3_desc: Promoting cyber technologies like AI and AGI that prioritize human safety, ethics, and security in development and application.
values_principle4_desc: Dedicated to advancing AI sovereignty and data sovereignty platforms to shape a secure digital future for all.
values_principle5_desc: Aligning technology efforts with Catholic Social Teaching and principles shared across religions to preserve peace and advance human welfare.
values_principle6_desc: Creating an advanced web portal to connect experts, technologists, faith leaders, and organizations to advance ethical, secure technologies for humankind.
values_activity1_desc: Immersive programs on AI and cyber safety
values_activity2_desc: Safe cyber and AI technology services
values_activity5_desc: Global solutions for AI and cyber safety
values_program1_desc: Deliver interactive, value-based cybersecurity and human-centered AI training for schools aimed to foster human-centered technology education.
values_program2_desc: Provide ethical, value-driven mentoring and curricula for young developers, supported by AI engineers through internships, hackathons, and advanced programming guidance.
values_program3_desc: Assist in developing a human-centered integral ecosystem and VR/AR Immersive Tech and Center of Excellence for autism in Castel Gandolfo with DCF technologies and programs.
values_program4_title: Fabbrica di San Pietro Digital Enhancement
values_program4_desc: Explore applying DCF technologies to improve digital community engagement and user experiences at Fabbrica di San Pietro.
values_program5_title: Center of Cyber and AI Excellence in Rome
values_program5_desc: Investigate facility acquisition to create a hub for human integral development, ethics-based AI training, leadership events, and cyber safety programs.
values_program6_title: Digital Sovereignty Initiatives in Vatican City
values_program6_desc: Explore sovereign technology platforms to boost cybersecurity, ransomware protection, and AI-driven efficiencies for optimal Vatican data utilization.
resources_hero_subtitle: Discover cutting-edge research, tools, and insights from our global community of experts working to ensure AI serves human dignity and the common good.
resources_browse_subtitle: Find exactly what you need with our filtering system
resources_empty_message: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.
values_opening_subtitle: AI Is Changing Everything — But Who Is It Changing For?
values_opening_paragraph1: In the age of artificial intelligence, the very definition of what it means to be human is being rewritten. We face a fundamental choice: allow technology to evolve without ethical oversight, or take an active role in directing its development to serve human dignity and the common good.
values_opening_paragraph2: We are called to help chart a course for humanity where technology is advanced in authentic service of the human family. This responsibility requires not just technical knowledge, but also wisdom, compassion, and an unwavering commitment to the values that define us as human beings.
values_opening_paragraph3: Like every advancement of the human spirit, AI can be an incredible gift to improve the lives of billions and find solutions to urgent global challenges. Conversely, it can also accelerate inequality and discrimination, eroding the human and ethical dimension from our societies if we do not guide it carefully.
values_pull_quote: Technology can and must lift up humanity, and humanity must not become subjugated to technology.
values_mission_paragraph3: Our mission extends beyond technological development to the creation of a global culture of responsible innovation. We work to ensure that every advancement in AI and cyber technology is evaluated not only for its technical capability, but for its contribution to human flourishing.
values_mission_paragraph4: Through collaboration with religious leaders, ethical technologists, researchers, and policy makers from around the world, we are building bridges between technological innovation and ancient wisdom, creating a future where progress serves all peoples of the Earth.
values_urgency_intro: The time to act is now. AI development is accelerating exponentially, and the decisions we make in the coming years will determine the course of humanity for generations.
values_urgency_left: Every day that passes without solid ethical frameworks is a missed opportunity to direct technology toward the common good. AI systems are being deployed in critical sectors from healthcare to education, from national security to social media.
values_urgency_right: We cannot afford to be reactive when it comes to humanity's future. We must be proactive, establishing principles and structures that guide technological development from the outset, not after damage has been done.
values_urgency_cta: Join us in creating a future where technology serves human dignity, where innovation is guided by compassion, and where every technological advancement brings us closer to a more just and equitable society for all.
values_mission_title: Together, We Can Shape an AI Future That Honors Every Human Value
values_mission_paragraph1: We are a constellation of nonprofits building a commons of donors, experts, technologists, academia, researchers and research institutes, governmental leaders and regulators, individuals, humanitarian organizations, and innovators for a world where technology serves humanity — not the other way around.
values_mission_paragraph2: We were formed with the inspiration of the values from Catholic Social Teaching with the support of the Vatican to integrate the values of all faiths and humankind into cyber technology and AI for the betterment of humankind.
values_quote_muhammad: The best among you are those who bring greatest benefit to others.
values_quote_tarfon: Do not be daunted by the enormity of the world's grief. Do justly now, love mercy now, walk humbly now.
values_quote_thich: Our own liberation is bound up with the liberation of all beings.
